4. Since the vctp is not the same, we cannot conclude that the vcpc and vcrt are the same for the two weapons systems mentioned in the claim.

5. Since we have already determined that the vctp is not the same, there is no need to compare the velocities (vcpc and vcrt) of other rows (3 and 5).

6. The claim "the vcpc and vcrt of 7.62 mm (0.3in) fn mag 60 - 20 machine gun be the same for vctp 20 mm (79in) rh - 202 autocannon" is FALSE, as the vctp (which affects the velocity values of vcpc and vcrt) are not equal between the two weapons systems.
